attributes.action: use the new appointment of MOD Advisor, Professor Mark Welland to address defence, international and health online petition ideas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the Prime Minister has named Professor Mark Welland FRS FREng as the new Chief Scientific Adviser at the Ministry of Defence (MOD) is a mark for progressive management. The petitioner is urging the PM to use the appointment as an opportunity to mobilise resources on some of the ideas submitted online in relation to hospital care and defence.
